document_data.name: ''Stone of Mixed Luck''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''stone of mixed luck''''' was an [[enchanted]] stone that provided good luck most of the time.
document_data.Powers: These magical stone provided good luck to whoever carried them for most of the time. However, every now and then they did the exact opposite.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Myste]], an [[illusionist]] from [[Toril]], owned a ''stone of mixed luck''.{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1993|147|Myste}}
